long_description: ortho revive - holistic regenerative & rehabilitation therapy for musculoskeletal disorders jointly with svasthi orthopedic. offering world class treatments & therapies to rehabilitate, rejuvenate by charging & energizing one's own bodies capability to heal itself continuously & completely naturally. non invasively, without medication or side effects the therapies are cutting edge & can help one & all. pain relief & regeneration form the fulcrum to the therapies. the system of treatment is a combination of regenerative treatment, rehabilitation, exercise, natural nutraceuticals & a regimented diet. it is effective to help repair neurological, orthopedic, & a wide spectrum of disorders naturally without side effects, without pain or medication. we offer high tech driven regenerative & lifestyle based devices aimed at improving the quality of life & lifestyle, through innovation of material science, engineering technology & manufacturing in india. the mission of the qr life sciences is to be an innovative manufacturer of regenerative technology & life technology devices.
generated_description: qr life sciences is an innovative manufacturer of regenerative technology and life technology devices based in india. the company's mission is to improve the quality of life and lifestyle through the innovation of material science, engineering technology, and manufacturing. qr life sciences aims to reach the entire nation and the world with its therapeutic and living technology products, with a focus on alternative medical treatments, lifestyle and living quality improvement products and technologies, air quality management systems, and other home life improvement technologies and health monitoring systems. one of their brands, ortho revive, offers holistic regenerative and rehabilitation therapy for musculoskeletal disorders through a combination of regeneratory treatment, rehabilitation, exercise, natural nutraceuticals, and a regimented diet. they also offer quantum resonance stimulating therapy, which stimulates regenerative processes at the cellular level to increase regenerative activity without side effects or medication.
